mapper.insert: insert into meteorological (id, city_id, humidity, pressure, rain1h, rain6h, rain12h, rain24h, tempDiff, temperature, time, windDirection, windSpeed) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{humidity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pressure,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rain1h,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rain6h,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rain12h,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rain24h,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tempdiff,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{winddirection,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{windspeed,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update meteorological set city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, humidity = #{humidity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pressure = #{pressure,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rain1h = #{rain1h,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rain6h = #{rain6h,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rain12h = #{rain12h,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rain24h = #{rain24h,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tempDiff = #{tempdiff,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, windDirection = #{winddirection,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, windSpeed = #{windspeed,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, city_id, humidity, pressure, rain1h, rain6h, rain12h, rain24h, tempDiff, temperature, time, windDirection, windSpeed from meteorological where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
